definition: remainder (after rounding a number)/decimal part (of number after the decimal point)/mantissa (i.e. fractional part of common logarithm in math.)/small change/balance (of an account)
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Why can you have mantissa effect?
Does a negative floating point mantissa also with or without sign it?
sentences.chinese: 請問一個負數的浮點數的尾數還帶不帶符號呀？

sentences.english: Obviously with finite precision the repetition in the mantissa will be cut off in different places.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，有限精度尾數的重複會在不同的地方切斷。

sentences.english: It's the Internet, and add another zero.
sentences.chinese: 這比因特網行業所帶動的還要多一個尾數零。

sentences.english: Do you think we should buy a terminal of the lottery with an eighty-five?
sentences.chinese: 你看我們要不要買一張尾數是八十五號的彩券？

sentences.english: For the sole purpose to their own bank deposits, a few more zero mantissa .
sentences.chinese: 爲的只是讓自己銀行存款尾數多加幾個零。

sentences.english: They rounded the price down to the nearest rouble.
sentences.chinese: 他們把價錢去掉尾數調低爲整盧布數。
